Package com.marginallyclever.makelangeloRobot

Interface MakelangeloRobotDecorator

All Known Implementing Classes:
Converter_Boxes, Converter_CannyEdge, Converter_CMYK, Converter_ColorBoxes, Converter_ColorFloodFill, Converter_Crosshatch, Converter_MagicCircle, Converter_Moire, Converter_Multipass, Converter_Pulse, Converter_RandomLines, Converter_Sandy, Converter_Spiral, Converter_Spiral_CMYK, Converter_SpiralPulse, Converter_VoronoiStippling, Converter_VoronoiZigZag, Converter_Wander, Converter_ZigZag, Generator_Border, Generator_Dragon, Generator_FibonacciSpiral, Generator_FillPage, Generator_GosperCurve, Generator_GraphPaper, Generator_HilbertCurve, Generator_KochCurve, Generator_Lissajous, Generator_LSystemTree, Generator_Maze, Generator_Package, Generator_Polyeder, Generator_SierpinskiTriangle, Generator_Spirograph, Generator_Text, ImageConverter, ImageGenerator
public interface MakelangeloRobotDecorator
MakelangeloRobotDecorator adds features to DrawPanel. An example is the Draw panel shows WYSIWYG progress, while the filters might show conversion while-you-wait updates.
Since:
7.1.4
Author:
Dan Royer
